docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 5--The General Committee of the United Nations General Assembly rejected today a Russian move to change the permanent headquarters to Europe.  approved a United States resolution to broaden the possible choice of sites to...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 5--The General Committee of the United Nations General Assembly rejected today a Russian move to change the permanent headquarters to Europe. approved a United States resolution to broaden the possible choice of sites to include Flushing Meadow and the San Francisco Bay area, as well as Westchester.
